MCQ: What is the main focus of machine learning?
Choices: a: Development of statistical algorithms | b: Study of artificial intelligence | c: Learning from data | d: All of the above

MCQ: Which field has machine learning NOT been applied to?
Choices: a: Natural language processing | b: Agriculture | c: Music composition | d: Medicine

MCQ: Who coined the term 'machine learning' in 1959?
Choices: a: Donald Hebb | b: Arthur Samuel | c: Tom M. Mitchell | d: Walter Pitts

MCQ: What is the mathematical foundation of machine learning?
Choices: a: Data mining | b: Computational statistics | c: Mathematical optimization | d: Exploratory data analysis

MCQ: What is the main objective of modern-day machine learning?
Choices: a: To classify data based on models | b: To predict future outcomes | c: Both a and b | d: None of the above
